title: Registration Now Open – Deadline October 27, 2025 (or Until Capacity Is Reached)
summary: The conference will be held in both onsite and online formats. Participants in the field of medical education are warmly invited.
content:
Conference Format

This conference will be conducted in both onsite and online (virtual) formats. Please select one participation method when registering.

Date and Time

November 3, 2025 (Monday), 09:00–15:00

Venue

Auditorium, 6th Floor, E-Da Cancer Hospital

Registration Information

  • Registration period: From now until October 27, 2025 (registration will close early if capacity is reached)
  • Onsite participation: Auditorium, 6th Floor, E-Da Cancer Hospital
  • Online participation: The meeting link will be sent via email two days prior to the conference

Notes

The conference is free of charge. Complimentary parking is not provided for onsite participants. Lunch is not included.

Contact Information

Department of Medical Education
Ms. Pei-Jun Kuo
Tel: +886-7-6150011 ext. 1618
Email: ed103513@edah.org.tw

Downloads

Relevant materials will be announced on the official website.

title: Continuing Education Credits: Guidelines and Important Notes
summary: This announcement outlines the check-in/check-out requirements, eligibility criteria, and credit hours for continuing education credits.
content:
I. Important Notes on Credit Recognition

1. In accordance with the regulations of the respective professional associations, participants must complete both check-in and check-out within the designated time periods. Late check-in or check-out will result in ineligibility for continuing education credits, even if the online form remains accessible.
The check-in/check-out form link will be announced in the Webex chatroom on the day of the conference.

Session Check-in Time Check-out Time
Morning Session 08:50–09:10 11:50–12:10
Afternoon Session 13:20–13:40 15:20–15:40

2. Registered participants must attend the conference in full and complete check-in, check-out, the satisfaction survey, and both pre- and post-tests. Failure to complete all required items will result in ineligibility for credit recognition.

3. To ensure proper identification, please set your Webex display name in the format: Affiliation + Full Name. Participants whose names do not meet this requirement may be asked to rejoin the meeting, and continuing education credits may not be granted.

II. Recognized Continuing Education Credit Hours

The following credits have been officially approved. Credit applications for other professional categories are still under review and will be announced once finalized.

III. Notes for E-Da Healthcare System Staff

Staff members of the E-Da Healthcare System may receive 4 hours of in-house general faculty development training credits.

title: Online Registration Fully Booked – Onsite Participation Still Available
summary: The quota for online participation has been filled. Onsite registration remains open, with complimentary meals provided.
content:
We sincerely appreciate the strong interest and enthusiastic registration for this conference.

Due to the online (virtual) participation quota being fully booked, online registration has been temporarily closed.

We warmly invite interested participants to register for onsite attendance. In addition to in-person academic exchange and discussion, complimentary meals will be provided for onsite participants.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact the organizing team. Thank you for your understanding and continued support.
